question: Ramanathan Ramanan has been appointed as mission director of Atal Innovation Mission. He is a senior executive of this famous company.
explanation: Ramanathan Ramanan, senior vice president at TCS, has been appointed as mission director of Atal Innovation Mission, under the government's premier think tank NITI Aayog. It's initiative to promote entrepreneurship in the country, in perhaps the first initiative to bring in best of private minds to drive innovation in governance.
